savingsBlockDescription: Unspent spending limit will automatically be paid out to you this month.
benefitShopDescription: Choose how you want to spend your budget and compose your benefits in the Benefit Shop.
rewardOverviewDescription: View your salary, fixed remuneration elements and your annual bonus.

hoursDescription: Declare your overtime, standby-hours and PWO.
individualEffectCalculationDescription: View your rewards and benefits before and after harmonization.
